personal.name: Aliya Tynybayeva
personal.title: Product Designer
personal.tagline: Crafting User-Centered Digital Experiences Through Research-Driven Design
personal.bio: Product Designer with a strong foundation in UI/UX from Yonsei University's Underwood International College. I specialize in end-to-end product design, from user research and wireframing to high-fidelity prototypes and design systems. My experience spans mobile apps, legaltech platforms, and brand identity, always driven by data and user insights to create meaningful digital experiences.

projects.title: Collabix Mobile App
projects.overview: Designing the full end-to-end mobile app experience for Collabix, from initial concept to final UI/UX delivery, establishing design systems and scalable UI components.
projects.challenge: Create a cohesive mobile app experience from scratch while ensuring consistency across the entire application and balancing technical feasibility with business requirements.

userSegments.whoPays: Sellers (brands, small businesses) looking to promote products through authentic content
userSegments.whoUses: UGC creators producing content, Sellers managing campaigns and collaborations
userSegments.whoSuffers: New creators struggling to find brand deals, Small sellers with limited marketing budgets

frictionPoints.onboarding: Complex verification process for creators, unclear campaign setup for sellers
frictionPoints.activation: First successful collaboration takes too long, payment terms unclear
frictionPoints.dropOff: Creators abandon after no response from brands, sellers leave due to content quality concerns
frictionPoints.trustIssues: Creators worry about payment security, sellers concerned about content authenticity

methods.name: Requirements Gathering
methods.description: Collaborated with stakeholders to understand business goals and user needs

methods.name: Design System Development
methods.description: Created comprehensive design system for consistency

solution.approach: User-centered design with focus on consistency and scalability through comprehensive design system.

keyFeatures.name: Design System
keyFeatures.description: Established visual style guide and scalable UI components
keyFeatures.impact: Ensured consistency across the entire app

keyFeatures.name: End-to-End Design
keyFeatures.description: Complete user journey from onboarding to core features
keyFeatures.impact: Seamless user experience throughout the app

keyFeatures.name: Developer Collaboration
keyFeatures.description: Close collaboration with development team for production-ready designs

appUsers.description: In first month after app launch

projects.title: LegalTech Platform Redesign
projects.overview: Conducted comprehensive user research and redesigned the platform experience, identifying friction points and creating interactive prototypes aligned with legal and technical requirements.
projects.challenge: Users were experiencing friction across multiple touchpoints, leading to poor conversion rates. The platform needed to balance legal compliance with user-friendly design.

userSegments.whoPays: Businesses (startups, SMEs) seeking quick and affordable legal registration services
userSegments.whoUses: Entrepreneurs, founders, business owners filling out registration forms
userSegments.whoSuffers: First-time founders confused by legal requirements, businesses facing delays due to paperwork errors

frictionPoints.onboarding: Overwhelming legal terminology, unclear document requirements
frictionPoints.activation: Users unsure which business type to select, form abandonment at complex sections
frictionPoints.dropOff: Users leave when asked for documents they don't have, payment hesitation without clear value
frictionPoints.trustIssues: Concerns about data security, uncertainty if registration will be legally valid

methods.name: User Interviews
methods.description: Conducted in-depth interviews to understand user pain points

methods.name: Google Analytics Analysis
methods.description: Analyzed user behavior data to identify drop-off points

methods.name: Wireframing & Prototyping
methods.description: Created low-to-high fidelity wireframes and interactive prototypes

solution.approach: Data-driven redesign focusing on reducing friction while maintaining legal compliance.

keyFeatures.name: Streamlined User Flows
keyFeatures.description: Redesigned core user journeys based on analytics insights

keyFeatures.name: Interactive Prototypes
keyFeatures.description: High-fidelity Figma prototypes for user testing

keyFeatures.name: Cross-functional Alignment
keyFeatures.description: Collaborated with legal and technical teams

investmentDeal.description: Investment deal secured with business angel

projects.title: Adata Platform Redesign
projects.overview: Redesigned landing and filter pages for Adata, a counteragent verification platform in the financial sector, improving user trust and client acquisition.
projects.challenge: The existing platform lacked visual credibility for a financial verification service. Users needed to quickly assess counteragent reliability, but the interface was not intuitive or trustworthy.

userSegments.whoPays: Businesses (finance departments, procurement teams) needing counteragent verification
userSegments.whoUses: Financial analysts, accountants, procurement managers checking partner reliability
userSegments.whoSuffers: Companies that faced fraud or unreliable partners, teams wasting time on manual checks

frictionPoints.onboarding: Unclear what data sources are used, complex subscription tiers
frictionPoints.activation: First search yields too much or too little data, unclear report interpretation
frictionPoints.dropOff: Users abandon when verification takes too long, leave if data seems outdated
frictionPoints.trustIssues: Uncertainty about data accuracy, concerns about legal validity of reports

methods.name: User Flow Analysis
methods.description: Analyzed how users navigate through counteragent checks

solution.approach: Clean, professional redesign focusing on trust, clarity, and efficient data filtering.

keyFeatures.name: Advanced Filter System
keyFeatures.description: Intuitive filter pages for counteragent verification
keyFeatures.impact: Faster and more efficient user workflows

keyFeatures.name: Trust-Building Design
keyFeatures.description: Visual elements conveying reliability and professionalism
keyFeatures.impact: Attracted more clients to the platform

projects.title: Maqam Marketplace
projects.overview: Designed web pages for Maqam, a marketplace connecting sellers and users in the beauty and healthy food industry, creating an intuitive e-commerce experience.
projects.challenge: Create a marketplace platform that serves both sellers and buyers in the beauty and healthy food niche, balancing seller management tools with a seamless shopping experience for users.

userSegments.whoPays: Sellers (beauty brands, healthy food producers) paying platform fees, Buyers purchasing products
userSegments.whoUses: Sellers listing and managing products, Buyers browsing and purchasing, Admins moderating content
userSegments.whoSuffers: Small sellers struggling with visibility, Buyers unsure about product authenticity, New users overwhelmed by choices

frictionPoints.onboarding: Complex seller registration, buyers need account to purchase, unclear platform benefits
frictionPoints.activation: Sellers unsure how to optimize listings, buyers can't find niche products easily
frictionPoints.dropOff: Cart abandonment due to shipping costs, sellers leave due to low sales
frictionPoints.trustIssues: Product authenticity concerns for health items, seller credibility questions, payment security worries

methods.name: Market Research
methods.description: Analyzed beauty and healthy food marketplace trends

methods.name: User Journey Mapping
methods.description: Mapped both seller and buyer journeys

solution.approach: User-friendly marketplace design balancing seller tools with buyer experience in the beauty and health niche.

keyFeatures.name: Marketplace Web Pages
keyFeatures.description: Clean, intuitive pages for product browsing and discovery

keyFeatures.name: Seller Dashboard
keyFeatures.description: Easy-to-use tools for sellers to manage products

keyFeatures.name: Product Showcase
keyFeatures.description: Visual-first design highlighting beauty and health products
